alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Madison; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 06 at 4:55AM EST until January 06 at 5:30AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 AM EST FOR WESTERN LAFAYETTE...TAYLOR AND MADISON COUNTIES... At 455 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Blue Springs to 37 miles west of Steinhatchee, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mayo, Madison, Perry, Steinhatchee, Lee, Pinland, Jug Island, Ebb, Buckville, Dekle Beach, Jack Lee Island, Foley, Salem, Hanson, Perry-Foley Airport, San Pedro Junction, Hampton Springs, Sirmans, Shady Grove, and Cedar Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
